h2. Machine Buckets Features
h4. The Machine Buckets tool is a portal that consolidates your resources on multiple private and public cloud stacks and offers unique actions to apply on your virtual machines:
* Enhanced 1 click deployment, auto scale, auto maintenance
* Move a virtual machine between clouds
* Console access from within your browser
* Simple user interface
* Open, simple API

{{html: <hr> }}

h3. Features

{{html:
<ul class="Features multi">
   <li><i class="icon-play-circle"></i><span>Start/Stop/Pause Machine</span></li>

   <li><i class="icon-reply"></i><span>Self-rollback snapshots</span></li>
   <li><i class="icon-copy"></i><span>Clone machine</span></li>
   <li><i class="icon-download"></i><span>Export machine</span></li>
   <li><i class="icon-upload"></i><span>Import custom image</span></li>
   <li><i class="icon-wrench"></i><span>Full DNS management</span></li>
   <li><i class="icon-th"></i><span>Multiple hypervisor support</span></li>
   <li><i class="icon-sitemap"></i><span>Virtual networking</span></li>
   <li><i class="icon-desktop"></i><span>Console access from browser</span></li>
   <li><i class="icon-search"></i><span>Built-in server monitoring</span></li>
   <li><i class="icon-fullscreen"></i><span>Scale machine package up/down</span></li>

</ul>

h3. Pricing

Customers will be able to buy a package with CPU and Memory and a storage package. Going forward, they can change the package.

{{html:

<div ng-app="cloudscalers" ng-controller="PricingController">
   <span>{[cpuList[cpu].cores]}</span>
   <ng-pluralize count="cpuList[cpu].cores"
                 when="{'one': 'Core',
                     'other': 'Cores'}">
   </ng-pluralize>
   - {[cpuList[cpu].price]} USD/month
   <br>
   <div ui-slider="{range: 'min'}"  min="0" max="7" step="1" ng-model="cpu"></div>
   <br>

   {[memoryList[memory].memory]} Memory 
   - {[memoryList[memory].price]} USD/month
   <br>
   <div ui-slider="{range: 'min'}"  min="0" max="9" step="1" ng-model="memory"></div>
   <br>

   {[storageList[storage].size]} SSD
   - {[storageList[storage].price]} USD/month
   <br>
   <div ui-slider="{range: 'min'}"  min="0" max="9" step="1" ng-model="storage"></div>
   <br>

   {[locationsList[location].number]}
   <ng-pluralize count="locationsList[location].number"
                 when="{'one': 'location',
                     'other': 'location'}">
   </ng-pluralize>
   - {[locationsList[location].price]} USD/month
   <br>
   <div ui-slider="{range: 'min'}"  min="0" max="1" step="1" ng-model="location"></div>
   <br>

   Total price: <input type="text" ng-model="totalPrice" readonly /> USD/month

</div>

}}
